question: Pradhan Mantri Van Dhan Yojana is the flagship scheme of which Union Ministry?
option1: Ministry of Environment, Forest and Climate Change
option4: Ministry of Animal Husbandry, Dairying and Fisheries
explanation:
The Ministry of Tribal Affairs launched the ‘Pradhan Mantri Van Dhan Yojana’ in 2019, through TRIFED. It aims at creating livelihood for tribal people by using the forest produce. Van Dhan Kendras are set up to add branding and packaging their products.
Recently, Union Minister for Tribal Affairs Shri Arjun Munda inaugurated the “Workshop on Van Dhan and Entrepreneurship Development” organized by TRIFED (Tribal Cooperative Marketing Development Federation of India).
